name: zanzibar-trail-tours-web
description: Zanzibar Trail Tours - Flutter Web App

scripts.build: curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && export PATH=$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH && flutter doctor && flutter build web --release
scripts.vercel-build: curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && export PATH=$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH && flutter doctor && flutter build web --release
